links: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) =n/A008835.Dirichlet g.f. zeta(4s)*zeta(s-1)/zeta(4s-4). The Dirichlet convolution of this sequence with A008835 is A000203. - R. J. Mathar, Apr 05 2011
prog: (Python)from operator import mulfrom functools import reducefrom sympy import factorintdef A053165(n):....return 1 if n <=1 else reduce(mul,[p**(e % 4) for p,e in factorint(n).items()])# _Chai Wah Wu_, Feb 04 2015(PARI) a(n)=my(f=factor(n)); f[,2]=f[,2]%4; factorback(f) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 02 2015
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 29 2000
